br.com.xy_inc.controller

Class AtributoController

  • java.lang.Object
    • br.com.xy_inc.controller.AtributoController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GenericController<Atributo>

    @Controller
public class AtributoController
extends java.lang.Object
implements GenericController<Atributo>
    Controller referente a Entidade Atributo que e a interface de comunicacao entre a View ou Servico com a camada DAO correspondente.
    Since:
    23/10/2015
    Author:
    Leonardo
